title: Ice cream : manufacturing sales volume in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2009 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in thousand liters, containing a total of 10 data points.
Overall Sales volume in thousand liters has decreased over the Year.
Sales volume in thousand liters is roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Sales volume in thousand liters, of value 442961.0 was reached at Year 2010
The lowest Sales volume in thousand liters, of value 258484.0 was reported at Year 2016
